snippet: Daniel Rubinstein, a senior foreign-service official, will fill the position vacated by Robert S. Ford, who retired last month.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry names Daniel Rubinstein, senior foreign service official with long experience in the Middle East, as new special envoy for Syria.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Rubinstein, a senior foreign-service official, will fill the position vacated by Robert S. Ford, who retired last month.

headline.main: Kerry Announces U.S. Representative to Syrian Opposition
headline.print_headline: Syria: U.S. Appoints a Special Envoy
